name: Oh My Dragon
description:
Strange noises aren't so strange in a magic forest, but the little wizard Vivi doesn't expect to stumble across an abandoned baby dragon. Help Vivi Care for her new friend by feeding, cleaning, and reading to it.  Don't forget to help it exercise it's wings!

This game was for: WeeklyGameJam / Week: 98 / Theme: Tame a Dragon

TEAM: Writer/Narrative: Felmuffin / Code: Crass Sandwich / Audio: ViktorRKraus / Art: ShainaSenpaii
